mapper.insert: INSERT INTO addressBook(addressBookNum, memberNum, name, tel, fax, email, belongto, zip, addr1, addr2, groupNum) VALUES (addressBook_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberNum}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{belongto}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{groupNum})
mapper.select: SELECT addressBookNum, name, tel, groupName FROM addressBook a JOIN addressBookGroup g ON a.memberNum=g.memberNum WHERE a.memberNum=#{memberNum} ORDER BY name
